name: Alien WipeOut
description:
You've always dreamed of participating in a TV game show like Ninja warrior or Total Wipeout but never had the chance to do it. Now you can !

In Alien Wipeout, you'll play a contestant of Ultimate Ninja Beast Alien Castle Wipeout where you'll have to pass deadly obstacles while an alien anchorperson comments every move you make.

It's a die and retry kind of game, with a progressive difficulty.

You can use your keyboard (left / right to move and space to jump) or any gamepad.

You can double jump on walls to climb them.

Have fun!

This game was created during Angry Smile Beginners Circle Jam #4

All code is written by me

All art is by MarieArty

Credits

Music by Patrick de Arteaga https://patrickdearteaga.com/ (Free license)

Game sounds by Game Supply  https://gamesupply.itch.io/1000-nintendo-sound-effects (8bit-like sounds package)
